data.name: CODE:VALKYRIE II
data.detailed_description:
Battle through soul-like fields with high quality, cute models and exhilarating guns and blades.
This game contains clothing destruction, sexual events.



Summary
・This game contains clothing destruction and sexual events.
・Although the game volume is not large, this game will make you have a high-quality experience.

Destruction of clothes and defeat events:
・All Costumes Can Be Destroyed.
・Private Rooms Can Be Invaded.
・There are many hidden elements, let's explore every corner of the field!



About the specifications [Important]:
・When you start the game for the first time, please reset the graphics settings to default.
・The action part is for gamepad (Xbox controller is assumed and vibration is supported).

Play Tips
・Middle Click While Aiming Will Shoot Grenades.
・Press and hold the middle button to fire a grenade.
・If you jump at the right time after the blade lands, you can make a long jump.
・If you are not good at action, there are safe ways and routes to attack enemies.

data.short_description: Battle through soul-like fields with high quality, cute models and exhilarating guns and blades. This game contains clothing destruction, sexual events.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows:7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows:10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.
